net.proteusframework.core.spring

Class CommandLineHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.spring.CommandLineHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class CommandLineHelper
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Helper class for running command line programs.

    Example:

    
    public static void main(String[] args)
    {
        try (CommandLineHelper clh  = new CommandLineHelper())
        {
            clh.contextRegister(MyConfig.class);
            clh.runApplication(new MyJob());
        }
    }
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

        @Nullable
public <R> R runApplication(@Nonnull
                            Callable<R> application)
        Start the specified application and wait until it is finished before returning. The ApplicationContext will be started if necessary.

        The application context will be available when the call method is called.

        Type Parameters:
        R - the return type.
        Parameters:
        application - the application to run.
        Returns:
        the return value from the application.

        public Future<?> startApplicationRunnableClass(@Nonnull
                                      Class<? extends Runnable> applicationClass)
        Start the specified application. The ApplicationContext will be started if necessary.

        The application context will be available when the class is instantiated.

        Parameters:
        applicationClass - the application to run. Must have a no-arg constructor.
        Returns:
        the Future.
